item.title: Recommendation :: Laurent Kupersztych
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: Daniel is extremely professional and he’s always motivated and has a positive attitude when dealing with people. He lead the project we worked for and used own initiative and paid close attention to detail. He’s motivated, honest and results oriented !!!! LK
